text: Chea Sim (; 15 November 19328 June 2015) was a Cambodian politician. He was the President of the National Assembly of Cambodia from 1981 to 1998 (Vice President from June to October 1993) and President of the Senate from 1999 until his death. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Heads of state of Cambodia
title: Chea Sim
